name: John Pacovsky
biography:
Artist and illustrator.
Work has appeared in "Absolut Book", Art & Antiques, Artnews, Connoisseur Magazine, Elle Homme, Esquire, Forbes, Interview, The New Yorker, Women's Wear Daily, etc.
Exhibition venues include Avery Fisher Hall, Lincoln Center, New York; Adler & Company, San Francisco; Chadds Ford Gallery, Pennsylvania; Dumont-Landis Fine Art, Princeton, New Jersey; Everhart Museum, Scranton, Pennsylvania; Gravely Gallery, Washington, D.C.; etc.
Work has been featured on Channels 16, 22 and 28. ABC, CBS & NBC News Affiliates. Channel 13, PBS, New York. Prestige TV, Tokyo, Japan.

Source: Personal communication, John Pacovsky, October 2001.
